award_title: Nanoscale Morphologies and Selective Solvents to Promote Cation Transport in Polymers
subject: How do you keep analysis scripts in sync across groups?
body:
Collaborating with computational scientists on experimental data—I imagine keeping analysis scripts in sync gets messy. Different environments, version drift, code that only runs on one person's setup.

We built Ouro to make computational methods citable and reusable—so workflows live as infrastructure, not just supplements.

Quick call in January? Focused on multi-site collaborations right now.

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
